section.section:
A person who violates § 13-2436 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding:
for a first violation, $5,000; or
for each subsequent violation, $10,000.
Each sale or offer of a chance from a tip jar is a separate violation.

text.section: If a person convicted under this section has a liquor license, the agency shall recommend to the Board of License Commissioners for Washington County that the Board suspend the person's liquor license for not less than 15 days.
